summary: Computer security, or cybersecurity, protects our digital world from threats. It stops people from accessing information without permission, stealing or damaging computer parts, or disrupting online services. This is important because we use computers and the internet for almost everything now, from smartphones to smart homes. Cybersecurity includes digital tools like passwords and encryption, but also simple things like locks on computers to stop physical tampering. It's a big challenge because technology is so complex and connected.
title: Computer security
